name: tpfinalaydaii
description: Herramienta para usar algoritmos geométricos básicos.

scripts.build-and-run: npm run web-build-release && npm run run
scripts.web-build-release: npm run generate-electron-package-config && rsync -ruthq --delete --progress --exclude=wasm/ --exclude=package.json src/web/ web-build-release/
